Title: Directs the state insurance fund to offer title insurance and authorizes the superintendent of financial services to implement such program
Summary: Directs the state insurance fund to offer title insurance; authorizes the superintendent of financial services to implement such program.
LawCode: Amd ยง76, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to directing the state insurance fund to offer title insurance or certificates of clear title
